casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2002-1808. State v. Wagner.

Paulding App. No. 11-02-03. Discretionary appeal allowed and cause held for the decision in 2002-1807, State v. Schmitt, Mercer App. No. 10-01-16, 2002-Ohio-4615; briefing schedule stayed.

F.E. Sweeney, J., dissents. O’Connor, J., not participating.
